pr:producer.pr:name: Château Feytit Clinet
pr:producer.pr:description: Good things, they say, come in small packages; this is certainly the case at Château Feyit Clinet, the maker of thelabel Pomerol.

pr:producer.pr:name: Château Doisy-Védrines
pr:producer.pr:description: Blessed with ancient vines, the fruit here is often subject to high levels of Botrytis (or noble rot), which shrinks the grapes and concentrates sugar levels in the remaining juice.
